title: ION - It's Only Natural Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegetarian turned vegan restaurant, ION offers a breakfast as well lunch/dinner menu, plus juices, smoothies, whole vegan cakes to take home, and fresh baked bread. Weekly and daily specials. Hosts workshops on organic gardening, raw food demo, and cooking. Re-opened here Sept 2013 after move from 386 Main St.
